C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot

C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot< function > Class Template Reference
[User Interface]

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static void createCustomFunction (C4DView *view)
static void createCustomSurface (C4DView *view)

Detailed Description

template<class function>
class C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot< function >

class CustomFunctionSlot class template to outsource redundant code for the generation of customized functions in a slot called by QActions from the QMenu
Parameters:
function the Function to be created in the slot

Member Function Documentation

template<class function>
void C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot< function >::createCustomFunction ( C4DView *  view  )  [inline, static]

Factory method to create a new customized Function of type R^3->R
This function template is called by each slot with the correct function type as template parameter
sets F to the newly created Function, checks the corresponding menu item, updates the ValuesDialog and redraws. Does some error handling in case the Function could not be loaded.

References C4DView::AssignValues(), ValuesDialogImpl::dt(), ValuesDialogImpl::du(), ValuesDialogImpl::dv(), C4DView::F, C4DView::Redraw(), ValuesDialogImpl::tmax(), ValuesDialogImpl::tmin(), ValuesDialogImpl::umax(), ValuesDialogImpl::umin(), C4DView::UpdateStatus(), C4DView::Values, ValuesDialogImpl::vmax(), and ValuesDialogImpl::vmin().

template<class function>
void C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot< function >::createCustomSurface ( C4DView *  view  )  [inline, static]

Factory method to create a new customized Function of type R^2->R^4
This function template is called by each slot with the correct function type as template parameter
sets F to the newly created Function, checks the corresponding menu item, updates the ValuesDialog and redraws. Does some error handling in case the Function could not be loaded.

References C4DView::AssignValues(), ValuesDialogImpl::dt(), ValuesDialogImpl::du(), C4DView::F, C4DView::Redraw(), ValuesDialogImpl::tmax(), ValuesDialogImpl::tmin(), ValuesDialogImpl::umax(), ValuesDialogImpl::umin(), C4DView::UpdateStatus(), and C4DView::Values.
